package.name: org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3
package.desc: Contains a programming interface enabling applications to communicate with an MQTT server.

class.name: org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.BufferedMessage
class.description: A BufferedMessage contains an MqttWire Message and token it allows both message and token to be buffered when the client is in resting state

class.name: org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.DisconnectedBufferOptions
class.description: Holds the set of options that govern the behaviour of Offline (or Disconnected) buffering of messages

class.name: org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.MqttAsyncClient
class.description: Lightweight client for talking to an MQTT server using non-blocking methods that allow an operation to run in the background.

class.name: org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.MqttClient
class.description: Lightweight client for talking to an MQTT server using methods that block until an operation completes.

class.name: org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.MqttConnectOptions
class.description: Holds the set of options that control how the client connects to a server.

class.name: org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.MqttDeliveryToken
class.description: Provides a mechanism to track the delivery progress of a message.

class.name: org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.MqttMessage
class.description: An MQTT message holds the application payload and options specifying how the message is to be delivered The message includes a "payload" (the body of the message) represented as a byte[].

class.name: org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.MqttToken
class.description: Provides a mechanism for tracking the completion of an asynchronous action.

class.name: org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.MqttTopic
class.description: Represents a topic destination, used for publish/subscribe messaging.

method.name: org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.DisconnectedBufferOptions
method.description: Constructs a new DisconnectedBufferOptions object using the default values.

method.name: org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.MqttAsyncClient
method.description: Create an MqttAsyncClient that is used to communicate with an MQTT server.

method.name: org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.MqttAsyncClient
method.description: Create an MqttAsyncClient that is used to communicate with an MQTT server.

method.name: org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.MqttClient
method.description: Create an MqttClient that can be used to communicate with an MQTT server.

method.name: org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.MqttClient
method.description: Create an MqttClient that can be used to communicate with an MQTT server.

method.name: org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.MqttConnectOptions
method.description: Constructs a new MqttConnectOptions object using the default values.

method.name: org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.MqttMessage
method.description: Constructs a message with an empty payload, and all other values set to defaults.

method.name: org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.MqttMessage
method.description: Constructs a message with the specified byte array as a payload, and all other values set to defaults.
